name: The Chosen One's Promise
desc: Go back to Tonatiuh and meet up with your companions.

customize.name: Moment of Awakening
customize.desc: To get the Jade of Return, you chase the evil dragon all the way to the very end...

customize.name: Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Bona and Coco, an adventurer and her companion, to find the Jade of Return and track the evil dragon down.

customize.name: City Buried By Ash
customize.desc: After an ambush from the evil dragon, you begin to explore Ochkanatlan in search of the Jade of Return.

customize.name: Vaulting the Wall of Morning Mist
customize.desc: To find the unknown treasure known as the Jade of Return and track the evil dragon down, you have stepped into ancient ruins to which entry is considered forbidden...

customize.name: A Dream of Gazing Upon the Distant Sky
customize.desc: Following the guidance of Cocouik, the traveler searches the ruins of Ochkanatlan to open the road to the skies.

customize.name: Adventure in the Land of Mists
customize.desc: After finally repelling the evil dragon, you and the self-proclaimed adventurer Bona set off on a journey alongside the mysterious Cocouik to find the Tonatiuh and the Jade of Return...

customize.name: Palace of the Vision Serpent
customize.desc: Following Cocouik's guidance, you come to the palace ruins on Ochkanatlan's upper levels. There seems to be something hidden beneath these ruins...

customize.name: To the Sky-Road
customize.desc: With two pieces of Pyrophosphorite in hand, the road to the skies is open to you at last...

customize.name: The Tonatiuh Quivers
customize.desc: Upon landing at the Legendary Tonatiuh, the mysteries of Bona, Cocouik, the evil dragon, and the Jade of return start to unravel.

customize.name: The Other Side of the Sky
customize.desc: Passing through an ocean of clouds, you finally arrive at the legendary Tonatiuh...

customize.name: The Flowing Primal Flame
customize.desc: According to Bona, you need to collect burning Firestones and offer them up to the Altar of Primal Flame if you wish to find the Jade of Return...

customize.name: Moment of Awakening
customize.desc: To get the Jade of Return, you chase the evil dragon all the way to the very end...

customize.name: The Chosen One's Promise
customize.desc: Go back to Tonatiuh and meet up with your companions.

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: The Cornerstone of Stars and Flames
customize.desc:
"Heroes ignite the sacred flame, illuminating the world, yet eventually they shall rest, nestled among the stars."

"They left behind a stone, a weaving. With these as our foundation, we have erected an everlasting civilization."

customize.text:
Return to the <color=#ece5d8>Tonatiuh</color>
Talk to your little Tepetlisaurus companion

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.name: Golden Entreaty
customize.desc: A white disc retrieved from the ruler of Cinder City's corroded ruins within Ochkanatlan. It is one of the essential tokens required to journey to the Great Volcano of Tollan and remove the "Flamelord's Blessing" from the little Tepetlisaur's body, and is said to have been one of the fragments left behind when the Flamelord's eye was split in two. According to legend, it is said that the ancient Dragonlord — who once held dominion over all light and wisdom — transformed one of his eyes into a conduit of supreme authority by which all flames might be governed, and that this became his only exploitable weakness...

customize.text:
After completing the World Quest, interact with Goggles Left Behind by Someone to obtain the achievement "Hero's Homecoming".
<color=#ffffff>Goggles Left Behind by Someone:</color>
(These appear to be a pair of goggles that were left here a long time ago. They once belonged to an adventurer who challenged a mighty, unknown foe.)
(The trap that once waylaid the people, planted by the Sage whom she laid down her life to defy, has now been destroyed. These goggles are the sole remaining testament to her existence.)
(Beneath the goggles, a stack of woven scrolls lie half-buried in the sand. The handwriting upon them is identical to that on the notes you discovered within Ochkanatlan.)
Optional Dialogue: Interact with "Goggles Left Behind by Someone" again.
<color=#ffffff>Goggles Left Behind by Someone:</color>
(These appear to be a pair of goggles that were left here a long time ago. They once belonged to an adventurer who challenged a mighty, unknown foe. These goggles testify that she once existed.)
